description: group of three women reclining in foreground; group of three women dancing center middle ground; woman carrying jug next to dancing women; group of three figures left center, one gesturing left and anotherwith covered head pointing right; building with dome on hill right background

title: St. Benedict Fleeing from Shameless Women, plate 7 from "The Life of St. Benedict"
